titleStmt.title: Some considerations (concerning the Quakers) of concernment to the Church of England propounded in a letter to the worthy author of The snake in the grass &c.
titleStmt.author: Crisp, Thomas, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and to be sold by C. Brome,
